title: Luxe Matte Lipstick
subtitle: Feather-light. Full-pigment. All-day comfort.
longDescription: A nourishing glaze that hydrates and replenishes. It feels like a thick glaze that glides on smoothly and smells like a fresh strawberry glazed donut. Good for all skin types, this product is Cruelty-Free, Vegan, Gluten-Free, and Dermatologist-Tested. Winner of the 2022 Allure Best of Beauty Award for Best Untinted Lip Balm.

shades.name: Rosewood 01
shades.desc: A deep and elegant rosewood, perfect for a sophisticated look that complements medium to deep skin tones with neutral or warm undertones.A deep and elegant rosewood, perfect for a sophisticated look that complements medium to deep skin tones with neutral or warm undertones.

shades.name: Soft Peach 02
shades.desc: A delicate and warm soft peach that brightens the complexion. Ideal for fair to medium skin tones, adding a touch of youthful vibrancy.

shades.name: Classic Mauve 03
shades.desc: A timeless and versatile classic mauve with cool undertones. This shade is universally flattering and suitable for any occasion, from day to night.

benefits: Blurs the look of lines & texture
how_to_use: Exfoliate lips gently and wipe clean.
Outline with the bullet tip and fill in the center.
Blot once with tissue; reapply for richer payoff.
claims: 93% agreed lips felt soft after 8 hours*
disclaimer: * consumer study, n=60, after 1 week of use

faqs.a: No. The formula includes emollients like squalane to keep lips comfortable.

faqs.q: Will it suit my skin tone?
faqs.a: Use the Shade Finder guide below—each shade lists undertone suggestions.

reviewsList.author: Priya S.
reviewsList.title: Finally, a matte that isn't drying!
reviewsList.comment: I've tried so many matte lipsticks that leave my lips feeling like a desert. This one is completely different! It's so comfortable and the Rosewood shade is my new favorite.

reviewsList.author: Anjali K.
reviewsList.title: Beautiful color, slightly less staying power
reviewsList.comment: The Soft Peach color is stunning and perfect for daily wear. It feels amazing on the lips. I just wish it lasted a bit longer through meals, but it's easy enough to reapply.

reviewsList.author: Rohan M.
reviewsList.title: Best lipstick I've ever bought
reviewsList.comment: I bought the Classic Mauve for my wife and she absolutely loves it. She says the texture is incredible and it looks fantastic. 10/10 would recommend.
